title: pazhamO pazhamO pazham
sahitya:
pazhamO pazhamO pazham (bhAgavata) bhavabhayamenum oru iruLai keDutta shukamuni enum kiLi kotti koDutta


anupallavi

  azhagAna mAmarait tarumElE idu yArukkum aridAnat tanmaiyAlE muzhu mOnap poruLukku 
ivaipOlE mun seida tIvinai enum nArillAdu mUNDiDum pAvamenum vaNDu tuLaikkAda


caraNam    tEDi tirindAlum kANa kiDaikkAdu deiva aruLai pOlE kaDaiyil kiDaikkAdu ADikkATril vizhavO eLidAi 
irukkAdu adarkkenna maTroru kAlamAghaTTum appOdu pArppOmE enrAl eppOdum kiDaikkAda
